user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we want to minimize our carbon footprint. Calculate the CO2e in Kg from a travel by car for a distance of 500 km using a MediumHybridCar. Additionally, fetch the URL for all medical guidelines to ensure we're well-prepared for any health-related situations we might encounter on the trip.

TaskList.description: Calculate the CO2e emissions in Kg for a 500 km trip using a Medium Hybrid Car.
Fetch the URL for medical guidelines to prepare for health-related situations during the trip.
